SourceString: Now create two characters:\nthe main character and their sibling.
Next, create the main characters sibling.
Are you sure you want to create an adventure\nlog with these two characters?
Which character would you like to recreate?
Do you want to return to the Adventure Log\nmenu? All progress will be lost. <lf><yesno 2><break>
Please select the gender of your character.
What is your relationship to your sibling from\nyour perspective?
Please select the main character's body type.
Please select your sibling's body type.
Create your character by choosing from the\navailable options.
Please select your character's eye color.
Enter your character's name.\n<color_yellow>**NOTE: If an English name is used, game progress will\nNOT be transferable to DQX Online!<color_white>
Enter the name of your characters sibling.
Please choose the body type of your sibling.
Please choose the body color of your sibling.
Please choose the color of your siblings hair.
Choose a face color for your sibling.
Choose the color of your siblings eyes.
Create your sibling's character by selecting from\nthe available options.
Is this what you want your character to look like?
Please choose an occupation for your character.
High strength, defense and HP, the warrior is\neffective at dealing damage and protecting allies.\nCan equip  one-handed swords, two-handed swords and axes.
A specialist with recovery spells they can also deal\nrepectable physical damage. \nAble to equip a spears, staves and clubs.
A specialist with offensive magic. Able to wield\ntwo-handed staves, daggers and whips.
Utilizes tension to increase power, with exceptional\nstrength and speed. \nAble to equip claws, clubs and fans.
A good all-arounder he has good physical strength\nand high speed. Can steal items from enemies. \nAble to equip daggers, whips and claws.
A well rounded fighter with good physical\nstrength, offensive and healing magic.\n.Able to equip a fan, club, and dagger.
Do you want to drop {0} and choose another race?
Are you sure you want to begin your adventure\nwith these two characters?
Do you want to start over making your\nsiblings character?
